alert.note: Alert for Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 11:41PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baker and central Columbia Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lulu, or 8 miles southeast of Lake City, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Five Points, Watertown, Lulu and Olustee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
